content.rendered:
Mine test is a type of sandbox game that is very similar to popular building games like Minecraft. In Minecraft you also have different blocks to create your world to measure.

Build relaxed and only worry about your survival.

In Mine test do you have different types of blockswhich are naturally generated on the created map, such as stones, sand, tree, iron, water, etc. With these elements you can create blocks that multiply the possibilities of your world.

game modes

  • Create. You don’t have a goal, you just have to build as you wish.
  • survival. Besides building your own environment, you must survive: search for food, protect yourself from the dangers…

Download now Mine test free and give free rein to your imagination create your own world with blocks.
